mapper.select: select * from Post order by postId desc
select * from Post where instaId like #{search} or description like #{search} order by postId desc
mapper.insert: insert into Post (instaId, description, Post.create) values (#{instaId}, #{description}, now())
mapper.update: update Post set instaId = #{instaId}, description = #{description} where postId= #{postId}
mapper.insert: insert into Reply (instaId, description, Reply.created, postId) values (#{instaId}, #{description}, now(), #{postId})
mapper.select: select * from Reply where postId = #{postId} AND reReplyId is null order by replyId desc
mapper.update: update Reply set instaId = #{instaId}, description = #{description} where replyId= #{replyId}
mapper.select: select * from Reply where reReplyId = #{replyId} order by replyId desc
